name: SysML v2 Interface Extraction
description: Extract interface definitions and their endpoints from a SysML v2 model.

evaluation.rubric: The answer must be valid JSON array containing interface definition objects. The model contains one interface definition 'VerbalCommunication' with two ends: 'communicationPartnerA' of type 'VerbalExchange' (not conjugate) and 'communicationPartnerB' of type '~VerbalExchange' (conjugate). The response should correctly identify this interface and its endpoint structure.
